Unicode的 `U+D800` `U+DFFF` 不占用字符

<br>
`U+010000` ~ `U+10FFFF` - ES6:

{{{
\uD83D \uDCA9

  ==

\u{1F4A9}

H = Math.floor((C - 0x10000) / 0x400) + 0xD800
L = (C - 0x10000) % 0x400 + 0xDC00

C = (H - 0xD800) * 0x400 + L - 0xDC00 + 0x10000
}}}
